com.jme3.bullet.collision

Class CollisionFlag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.bullet.collision.CollisionFlag

  • public class CollisionFlag
extends java.lang.Object
    Named collision flags for a PhysicsCollisionObject.
    See Also:
    PhysicsCollisionObject.getCollisionFlags(long)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CHARACTER_OBJECT
      flag for a character object, such as a PhysicsCharacter
      static int CUSTOM_MATERIAL_CALLBACK
      flag to enable a custom material callback for per-triangle friction/restitution (not supported by Minie)
      static int DISABLE_SPU_COLLISION_PROCESSING
      flag to disable parallel/SPU processing (not supported by Minie)
      static int DISABLE_VISUALIZE_OBJECT
      flag to disable debug visualization (not supported by Minie)
      static int HAS_COLLISION_SOUND_TRIGGER
      flag not supported by Minie
      static int HAS_CONTACT_STIFFNESS_DAMPING
      flag not supported by Minie
      static int HAS_CUSTOM_DEBUG_RENDERING_COLOR
      flag not supported by Minie: use PhysicsCollisionObject.setDebugMaterial(com.jme3.material.Material) instead
      static int HAS_FRICTION_ANCHOR
      flag not supported by Minie
      static int KINEMATIC_OBJECT
      flag for a kinematic object
      static java.util.logging.Logger logger
      message logger for this class
      static int NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE
      flag for an object with no contact response, such as a PhysicsGhostObject
      static int STATIC_OBJECT
      flag for a static object
